page.title: 11CLUBS - HOLBERROW GREEN
page.content:
The nearby Young Farmers Club attracts people from a wide circle, they come together on social evenings to enjoy each others company and usually listen to a talk given by an outside speaker on a variety of subjects, not necessarily connected with farming.
In addition they organise competitions amongst themselves and other young farmers groups often including old crafts which they are anxious to 'keep alive' a part of our heritage. These include ploughing, hedging and ditching, stock judging and poultry trussing.
Members have the opportunity to make overseas visits and these are orgainised at both county and national level. Those lucky enough to be chosen have their expenses paid for them.
